channel.title: anthocyanin on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in anthocyanin on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaYABBY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaYABBY5 Gene Name: YABBY family transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional regulation of flavonoid biosynthesis in Artemisia annua by AaYABBY5.

item.title: AcMADS68
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcMADS68 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: A new SEP gene, AcMADS68, was identified as a regulatory candidate for anthocyanin biosynthesis in the kiwifruit by transcriptome data and bioinformatic analyses.

item.title: AN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AN2 Gene Name: ANTHOCYANIN2 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: The anthocyanin biosynthesis pathway was strongly downregulated in star petals, including its major regulator ANTHOCYANIN2 (AN2).

item.title: BnbHLH92a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA06T0441000ZS Gene Symbol: BnbHLH92a Gene Name: Genome: BnPIR Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnbHLH92a is a candidate regulator for yellow-seeded B.

item.title: BoMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BoMYB2 Gene Name: Graffiti MYB2 Genome: Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Descriptions: Characterization of the regulatory network of BoMYB2 in controlling anthocyanin biosynthesis in purple cauliflower.

item.title: CsMYB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB3 and CsRuby1 form an ‘Activator-and-Repressor’ Loop for the Regulation of Anthocyanin Biosynthesis in Citrus.

item.title: CsMYB75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene017036 Gene Symbol: CsMYB75 Gene Name: MYB75 protein Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: A coupled role for CsMYB75 and CsGSTF1 in anthocyanin hyperaccumulation in purple tea.

item.title: CsMYBL2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYBL2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYBL2 homologs modulate the light and temperature stress-regulated anthocyanin and catechins biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: CsMYBL2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYBL2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYBL2 homologs modulate the light and temperature stress-regulated anthocyanin and catechins biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: CsRuby1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRuby1 Gene Name: Citrus sinensis Ruby1 Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: CsTCP14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsTCP14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTCPs regulate shoot tip development and catechin biosynthesis in tea plant.

item.title: CsTCP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsTCP3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTCPs regulate shoot tip development and catechin biosynthesis in tea plant.

item.title: CsTCP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsTCP4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTCPs regulate shoot tip development and catechin biosynthesis in tea plant.

item.title: CsTT8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g31400 Gene Symbol: CsTT8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTT8 regulates anthocyanin accumulation in blood orange through alternative splicing transcription.

item.title: DcMYB11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_010751 Gene Symbol: DcMYB11 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB 11 Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Report on the discovery of DNA structural differences affecting the activity of an R2R3 MYB (encoded by DcMYB11) involved in anthocyanin regulation in carrot petiole.

item.title: DcMYB113
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_008994 Gene Symbol: DcMYB113 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 113 Genome: carrot genome (V2.

item.title: DcMYB7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_010745 Gene Symbol: DcMYB7 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 7 Genome: DH1 (orange) carrot genome Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Changing Carrot Color: Insertions in DcMYB7 Alter the Regulation of Anthocyanin Biosynthesis and Modification1.

item.title: DkMyb4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb4 Gene Name: Myb transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb4 Is a Myb Transcription Factor Involved in Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Persimmon Fruit.

item.title: F3GGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GGT1 Gene Name: anthocyanidin 3-O-galactoside-2′’-O-xylosyltransferase Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.

item.title: F3GT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GT1 Gene Name: flavonoid 3-0-galactosyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.

item.title: F3H
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g11810 Gene Symbol: F3H Gene Name: flavanone-3-hydroxylase Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Bulked-segregant analysis sequencing analysis and gene function verification confirmed that the responsible mutation resides in a gene encoding flavanone-3-hydroxylase (F3H) in the anthocyanin synthesis pathway.

item.title: FabHLH3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FabHLH3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaMYB123 interacts with FabHLH3 to regulate the late steps of anthocyanin and flavonol biosynthesis during ripening.

item.title: FaMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor10 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: This insertion introduced a predicted premature termination codon, which suggested the loss of intact FaMYB10 protein playing a critical role in the loss of red colour in white octoploid strawberry.

item.title: FaMYB123
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_5g32460 Gene Symbol: FaMYB123 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB transcription factor 123 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaMYB123 interacts with FabHLH3 to regulate the late steps of anthocyanin and flavonol biosynthesis during ripening.

item.title: FhPAP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FhPAP1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Freesia hybrida Functional Descriptions: The Conserved and Particular Roles of the R2R3-MYB Regulator FhPAP1 from Freesia hybrida in Flower Anthocyanin Biosynthesis.

item.title: FveMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22020 Gene Symbol: FveMYB10 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB transcription factor FveMYB10 is a major regulator of anthocyanin pigmentation in the red fruits of strawberry.

item.title: FveMYB10L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22040 Gene Symbol: FveMYB10L Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 10 Like Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Using mapping-by-sequencing and transient functional assays, we confirmed that the causative mutation resides in a FveMYB10-Like (FveMYB10L) gene and that FveMYB10 and FveMYB10L function independently in the fruit and petiole, respectively.

item.title: FvMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_7g15060 Gene Symbol: FvMAPK3 Gene Name: MITOGEN-ACTIVATED PROTEIN KINASE 3 Genome: Fragaria vesca ID (v4.

item.title: FvMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22020 Gene Symbol: FvMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Fragaria vesca ID (v4.

item.title: FvWRKY50
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_2g31400 Gene Symbol: FvWRKY50 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 50 Genome: F.

item.title: GbBM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_A07G008330 Gene Symbol: GbBM Gene Name: Beauty Mark Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that GbBM directly targets the promoter of four flavonoid biosynthesis genes to positively regulate petal spot development.

item.title: GhANR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhANR Gene Name: anthocyanidin reductase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The three key genes of GhCHS, GhANR and GhLAR were predominantly expressed in the developing fibers of colored cotton.

item.title: GhCHS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCHS Gene Name: chalcone synthase 1-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The three key genes of GhCHS, GhANR and GhLAR were predominantly expressed in the developing fibers of colored cotton.

item.title: GhJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0810 Gene Symbol: GhJAZ2 Gene Name: jasmonate2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhJAZ2 attenuates cotton resistance to biotic stresses via the inhibition of the transcriptional activity of GhbHLH171.

item.title: GhLAR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhLAR Gene Name: leucoanthocyanidin reductase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The three key genes of GhCHS, GhANR and GhLAR were predominantly expressed in the developing fibers of colored cotton.

item.title: GmMYBA3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G262000.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBA3 Gene Name: Genome: Phytozyme 13 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular and genetic studies have characterized two antagonistic regulators, the positive activator GmMYBA3 and the negative repressor GmMYBR1, that modulate the gene expression of anthocyanin biosynthesis in soybean flowers.

item.title: GmMYBR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G247100.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular and genetic studies have characterized two antagonistic regulators, the positive activator GmMYBA3 and the negative repressor GmMYBR1, that modulate the gene expression of anthocyanin biosynthesis in soybean flowers.

item.title: HtMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene44371_All Gene Symbol: HtMYB2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Helianthus tuberosus Functional Descriptions: HtMYB2 (Unigene44371_All) was the only MYB transcription factor, homologous to the MYB transcription factor regulating anthocyanin biosynthesis, expressed in the red tuber epidermis of ‘QY1’.

item.title: HvGST
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU.MOREX.r3.7HG0713570.1 Gene Symbol: HvGST Gene Name: glutathione S-transferase Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvGST plays a key role in anthocyanin accumulation in colored barley.

item.title: LfMYB113
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LfMYB113 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 113 Genome: Species: Liquidambar formosana Functional Descriptions: A R2R3-MYB Gene LfMYB113 is Responsible for Autumn Leaf Coloration in Formosan sweet gum.

item.title: LhMYBSPLATTER
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LhMYBSPLATTER|LhMYB12-Lat Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lilium hybrid Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor (TF) LhMYBSPLATTER|LhMYB12-Lat (formerly known as LhMYBSPLATTER|LhMYB12-Lat), identified as the major kernel protein, regulating the anthocyanin biosynthesis pathway in ‘Tiny Padhye’ of Tango Series cultivars, which the pigmentation density is high in the lower half of tepals and this patterning is of exceptional ornamental value.

item.title: LhWRKY44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LhWRKY44 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 44 Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Descriptions: Multifaceted roles of LhWRKY44 in promoting anthocyanin accumulation in Asiatic hybrid lilies.

item.title: MdbHLH162
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1233000 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH162 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdbHLH162 connects the gibberellin and jasmonic acid signals to regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: MdbHLH33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdbHLH33 Gene Name: Malus domestica basic helix-loop-helix 33 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdBT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000643281 Gene Symbol: MdBT2 Gene Name: BROAD-COMPLEX, TRAMTRACK AND BRIC A BRAC2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: MdBT2 is a BTB protein that directly interacts with and stabilizes MdCOP1 by inhibiting self-ubiquitination.

item.title: MdBT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000151000 Gene Symbol: MdBT2 Gene Name: bric-a-brac/tramtrack/broad protein 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Dynamic regulation of anthocyanin biosynthesis at different light intensities by the BT2-TCP46-MYB1 module in apple.

item.title: MdBZR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000157809 Gene Symbol: MdBZR1 Gene Name: BRASSINAZOLE-RESISTANT 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Revealed the antagonistic relationship between light and brassinosteroid (BR) signaling pathways, which is mediated by BRASSINAZOLE-RESISTANT 1 (MdBZR1) and the B-box protein MdCOL6.

item.title: MdCIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000230486 Gene Symbol: MdCIP1 Gene Name: COP1-interacting protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Expression pattern analysis showed that MdCIP1 was constitutively expressed in various tissues of apple, and responded to stress and hormone signals at the transcriptional level.

item.title: MdCIPK20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000320872 Gene Symbol: MdCIPK20 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 20 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A protein kinase MdCIPK20 was found to phosphorylate and protect MdRGL2a from degradation, and it was essential for MdRGL2a-promoting anthocyanin accumulation.

item.title: MdCOL6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD17G1243400 Gene Symbol: MdCOL6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The regulatory module MdBZR1–MdCOL6 mediates brassinosteroid- and light-regulated anthocyanin synthesis in apple.

item.title: MdCOP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000245133 Gene Symbol: MdCOP1 Gene Name: CONSTITUTIVELY PHOTOMORPHOGENIC 1 Genome: Genome Database for Rosaceae (GDR| https://www.

item.title: MdEIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000423881 Gene Symbol: MdEIL1 Gene Name: EIN3-LIKE1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Ethylene precisely regulates anthocyanin synthesis in apple via a module comprising MdEIL1, MdMYB1, and MdMYB17.

item.title: MdERF1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdERF1B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The ethylene response factor MdERF1B regulates anthocyanin and proanthocyanidin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: MdERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000787281 Gene Symbol: MdERF3 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: EIN3-LIKE1, MYB1, and ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR3 Act in a Regulatory Loop That Synergistically Modulates Ethylene Biosynthesis and Anthocyanin Accumulation.

item.title: MdGRF11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD10G1280300 Gene Symbol: MdGRF11 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The apple 14-3-3 protein MdGRF11 interacts with the BTB protein MdBT2 to regulate nitrate deficiency-induced anthocyanin accumulation.

item.title: MdHB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHB1 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine zipper protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdHB1 down-regulation activates anthocyanin biosynthesis in the white-fleshed apple cultivar ‘Granny Smith’.

item.title: MdJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000452772 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ1 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) proteins MdJAZ1 and MdJAZ2 negatively modulate MdABI4-improved cold tolerance in apple by interacting with the MdABI4 protein.

item.title: MdJAZ18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000757701 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ18 Gene Name: jasmonate ZIM-domain protein 18 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdSnRK1.

item.title: MdMYB1–1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB1–1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The effect of promoter methylation on MdMYB1 expression determines the level of anthocyanin accumulation in skins of two non-red apple cultivars.

item.title: MdMYB1–2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB1–2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The effect of promoter methylation on MdMYB1 expression determines the level of anthocyanin accumulation in skins of two non-red apple cultivars.

item.title: MdMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Efficient induction of anthocyanin biosynthesis in transient assays by MdMYB10 was dependent on the co-expression of two distinct bHLH proteins from apple, MdbHLH3 and MdbHLH33.

item.title: MdMYB11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1184000 Gene Symbol: MdMYB11 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 11 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMYB110a_JP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000295218 Gene Symbol: MdMYB110a_JP Gene Name: transcription factor MYB110 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Expression and functional analysis of a novel MYB gene, MdMYB110a_JP, responsible for red flesh, not skin color in apple fruit.

item.title: MdMYB17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000211677 Gene Symbol: MdMYB17 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdMYB306-like inhibits anthocyanin synthesis by directly interacting with MdMYB17 and MdbHLH33.

item.title: MdMYB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB3 Gene Name: MYB domain class transcription factor3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An apple MYB transcription factor, MdMYB3, is involved in regulation of anthocyanin biosynthesis and flower development.

item.title: MdMYB306-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000144744 Gene Symbol: MdMYB306-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdMYB306-like inhibits anthocyanin synthesis by directly interacting with MdMYB17 and MdbHLH33.

item.title: MdMYB9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1070700 Gene Symbol: MdMYB9 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 9 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMYBPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYBPA1 Gene Name: PA1-type MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The proanthocyanidin-specific transcription factor MdMYBPA1 initiates anthocyanin synthesis under low-temperature conditions in red-fleshed apples.

item.title: MdMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000029168 Gene Symbol: MdMYC2 Gene Name: Jasmonate-Activated Transcription Factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdMYC2 is a homology of Arabidopsis MYC2 in apple, it has highly similarity in structure and function to the Arabidopsis MYC2.

item.title: MdPHR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1189400 Gene Symbol: MdPHR1 Gene Name: PHOSPHATE STARVATION RESPONSE1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: determined that MdPHR1 was essential for Pi deficiency-induced anthocyanin accumulation in apple (Malus × domestica).

item.title: MdSINA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1082000 Gene Symbol: MdSINA1 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdRGL2a and MdCIPK20 were ubiquitinated and degraded by E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA1 and MdSINA2, respectively, both of which were activated in the presence of GA.

item.title: MdSINA11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1054300 Gene Symbol: MdSINA11 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 11 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA4 and MdSINA11 regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis by targeting the IAA29-ARF5-1-ERF3 module in apple.

item.title: MdSINA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1218700 Gene Symbol: MdSINA2 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdRGL2a and MdCIPK20 were ubiquitinated and degraded by E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA1 and MdSINA2, respectively, both of which were activated in the presence of GA.

item.title: MdSIZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD11G1131700 Gene Symbol: MdSIZ1 Gene Name: SAP AND MIZ1 DOMAIN CONTAINING LIGASE1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdSnRK1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000191788 Gene Symbol: MdSnRK1.1 Gene Name: SNF1-related protein kinase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An Apple Protein Kinase MdSnRK1.

item.title: MdTCP46
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000319941 Gene Symbol: MdTCP46 Gene Name: Teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating transcription factor 46 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The expression of MdTCP46 was responsive to high light intensity, and under these conditions it promoted anthocyanin biosynthesis by direct interactions with MdMYB1 that enhanced the binding of the latter to its target genes.

item.title: MdTRB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000258862 Gene Symbol: MdTRB1 Gene Name: telomere-binding protein Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A series of biological assays showed that MdTRB1 acted as a positive modulator of anthocyanin and proanthocyanidin accumulation, and is dependent on MdMYB9.

item.title: NsMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster 8422.10600 Gene Symbol: NsMYB1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nitraria sibirica Functional Descriptions: Functional R2R3-MYB transcription factor NsMYB1, regulating anthocyanin biosynthesis, was relative to the fruit color differentiation in Nitraria sibirica Pall.

item.title: NtbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtbHLH1 Gene Name: basic helix-loop-helix 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtbHLH1, a JAF13-like bHLH, interacts with NtMYB6 to enhance proanthocyanidin accumulation in Chinese Narcissus.

item.title: PacCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: PaMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PaMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcriptional regulator 10 Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB transcription factor PaMYB10 is involved in anthocyanin biosynthesis in apricots and determines red blushed skin.

item.title: PbGA2ox8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbGA2ox8 Gene Name: pear GA 2-beta-dioxygenase 8 Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: PbGA2ox8 overexpression reduced the GA4 level and induced anthocyanin accumulation in pear fruit.

item.title: PbLAC4-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbLAC4-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: PbLAC4-like, activated by PbMYB26, related to the degradation of anthocyanin during color fading in pear.

item.title: PbMYB10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB10b Gene Name: MYB10b transcription factor Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Among these MYB-like genes, the specific functions of two novel MYB TFs, designated as PbMYB10b and PbMYB9, were further verified by both overexpression and RNAi transient assays.

item.title: PbMYB26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB26 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: PbLAC4-like, activated by PbMYB26, related to the degradation of anthocyanin during color fading in pear.

item.title: PbMYB9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB9 Gene Name: MYB9 transcription factor Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Among these MYB-like genes, the specific functions of two novel MYB TFs, designated as PbMYB10b and PbMYB9, were further verified by both overexpression and RNAi transient assays.

item.title: PhCCoAOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhCCoAOMT1 Gene Name: caffeoyl-coenzyme A O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Cloned and characterized a caffeoyl-coenzyme A O-methyltransferase (PhCCoAOMT1) from the petals of the fragrant petunia ‘Mitchell’.

item.title: PpERF105
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpERF105 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus pyrifolia Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-activated PpERF105 induces the expression of the repressor-type R2R3-MYB gene PpMYB140 to inhibit anthocyanin biosynthesis in red pear fruit.

item.title: PpMYB140
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr000876.1 Gene Symbol: PpMYB140 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus pyrifolia Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-activated PpERF105 induces the expression of the repressor-type R2R3-MYB gene PpMYB140 to inhibit anthocyanin biosynthesis in red pear fruit.

item.title: PsbHLH3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: evm.TU.Chr8.2504 Gene Symbol: PsbHLH3 Gene Name: Genome: ‘Sanyueli’ plum (https://www.

item.title: PsERF1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: evm.TU.Chr8.2346 Gene Symbol: PsERF1B Gene Name: Genome: ‘Sanyueli’ plum (https://www.

item.title: PsMYB10.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: novel_G001502 Gene Symbol: PsMYB10.1 Gene Name: Genome: ‘Sanyueli’ plum (https://www.

item.title: PsMYB10.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsMYB10.2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus salicina Functional Descriptions: An LTR retrotransposon in the promoter of a PsMYB10.

item.title: PsMYB30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster_9455 Gene Symbol: PsMYB30 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor30 Genome: Species: Paeonia suffruticosa Functional Descriptions: Tree Peony R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor PsMYB30 Promotes Petal Blotch Formation by Activating the Transcription of the Anthocyanin Synthase Gene.

item.title: PuHB40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: EVM0020592.1 Gene Symbol: PuHB40 Gene Name: Phosphorylated transcription factor Genome: pear genome database Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: Phosphorylated transcription factor PuHB40 mediates ROS-dependent anthocyanin biosynthesis in pear exposed to high light.

item.title: PuRBOHF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuRBOHF Gene Name: respiratory burst oxidase homolog Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: Production of reactive oxygen species by PuRBOHF is critical for stone cell development in pear fruit.

item.title: PybHLH3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PybHLH3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus communis Functional Descriptions: PyWRKY26 and PybHLH3 cotargeted the PyMYB114 promoter to regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis and transport in red-skinned pears.

item.title: PyMYB114
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PyMYB114 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus communis Functional Descriptions: PyWRKY26 and PybHLH3 cotargeted the PyMYB114 promoter to regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis and transport in red-skinned pears.

item.title: PyWRKY26

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RcMYB1 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The MYB transcription factor RcMYB1 plays a central role in rose anthocyanin biosynthesis.

item.title: RsMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RsMYB1 Gene Name: Bordeaux anthocyanin regulator Genome: Species: Raphanus sativus Functional Descriptions: Transposon-induced methylation of the RsMYB1 promoter disturbs anthocyanin accumulation in red-fleshed radish.

item.title: SlAN11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAN11 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA GLABRA 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlAN11 regulates flavonoid biosynthesis and seed dormancy by interaction with bHLH proteins but not with MYB proteins.

item.title: VvMYB5a
